2.0.4.en: Added icons to custom capabilities (change in Homey 2.0)

2.0.3.en: Bugfix: Fix triggers 'first device online' and 'last device offline'

2.0.2.en: Bugfix release. Upon initial installation, it failed to start the app, due to uninitialized settings.

2.0.1.en: Added triggers for non-paired devices (guests) (Usergroup token is provided too (if known)) and added SSID to connected triggers

2.0.0.en: Rewrite of app for SDKv2. Now using another library for unifi connectivity, hopefully fixing reconnects.

2.0.5.en: Add support for UniFi OS and beta support for cable clients.

2.0.6.en: Bug fix: Settings page will save now the settings.

2.0.8.en: Upgraded WebSocket lib for more stability

2.1.0.en: Bugfix websocket client crashing all the time and added flows for wired clients

2.1.1.en: Homey Community Topic now in app.json
